query:
SELECT 
  'Featured Quotes for Today' as feature,
  COUNT(*) as available_count
FROM quotes
WHERE isFeatured = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Teachers with Practices',
  COUNT(DISTINCT t.id)
FROM teachers t
INNER JOIN practices p ON t.id = p.teacherId
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Themes with Content',
  COUNT(DISTINCT th.id)
FROM themes th
WHERE th.id IN (SELECT DISTINCT themeId FROM keyIdeas WHERE themeId IS NOT NULL);
